description: Actors for testing search and filtering functionality

actors.name: Robert De Niro
actors.bio: Robert Anthony De Niro Jr. is an American actor known for his collaborations with Martin Scorsese.

actors.name: Al Pacino
actors.bio: Alfredo James Pacino is an American actor and filmmaker, known for playing mobsters and cops.

actors.name: Morgan Freeman
actors.bio: Morgan Freeman is an American actor, director, and narrator known for his distinctive deep voice.

actors.name: Samuel L. Jackson
actors.bio: Samuel Leroy Jackson is an American actor and producer, one of the most prolific actors of his generation.

actors.name: Brad Pitt
actors.bio: William Bradley Pitt is an American actor and film producer who has received numerous awards.

actors.name: Angelina Jolie
actors.bio: Angelina Jolie is an American actress, filmmaker, and humanitarian.

actors.name: Scarlett Johansson
actors.bio: Scarlett Ingrid Johansson is an American actress, the world's highest-grossing box office star in 2016 and 2019.

actors.name: Christian Bale
actors.bio: Christian Charles Philip Bale is an English actor known for his intense method acting and versatility.
